title: Amazon cited by OSHA for warehouse injury report failures
description: Amazon has been cited by the Occupational Safety and Health Administration for failing to record workplace injuries and illnesses.

title: US buying 3M barrels of oil to start replenishing reserves
description: The Biden administration says the U.S. is buying 3 million barrels of oil to begin to replenish U.S. strategic reserves that officials drained earlier this year to fight inflation

title: Suspect's dad charged in Highland Park parade mass shooting
description: The father of the suspected Highland Park, Illinois, mass shooter has been charged with seven counts of reckless conduct causing great bodily harm.

title: Historic ship resurfaces on Utah's shrinking Great Salt Lake
description: The wreckage of a ship that first set sail on Utah's Great Salt Lake 120 years ago can now be observed as the water body reaches historic lows.

title: Jan. 6 committee preparing Trump criminal referral to DOJ: Sources
description: The Jan. 6 committee is preparing to urge the DOJ to prosecute former President Trump on criminal charges during their meeting on Monday, sources told ABC News.

title: Want to email your doctor? You may be charged for that
description: The next time you message your doctor about a cough it could result in a bill.

title: Pentagon has received 'several hundreds' of new UFO reports
description: A new Pentagon office set up to track reports of unidentified flying objects has received “several hundreds” of new reports, but no evidence so far of alien life

title: Iowa man who joined mom at Capitol riot guilty on 12 counts
description: A federal judge in Washington has found an Iowa man guilty of 12 charges after he and his mother joined in the Jan. 6, 2021, riot at the U.S. Capitol

title: Protesters charged with harassing women entering abortion clinic
description: Two protesters from Tennessee surrendered Friday to face federal charges in New York for routinely harassing women entering a Planned Parenthood clinic in Manhattan.

title: Court upholds Connecticut's transgender athlete policy
description: A federal appeals court has dismissed a challenge to Connecticut’s policy of allowing transgender girls to compete girls’ high school sports

title: 5 Louisiana officers charged after deadly arrest of unarmed Black man in 2019
description: Ronald Greene died after a struggle with Louisiana State Police officers.

title: Medical transport plane with 3 on board missing in Hawaii
description: The company that operates a medical transport plane says it has gone missing in Hawaii

title: Phoenix airport 1st to offer self-driving ride service Waymo
description: As Phoenix gets ready to host the Super Bowl, Mayor Kate Gallego has announced Sky Harbor International Airport will be the world's first airport to offer the self-driving ride-hailing service Waymo

title: Brittney Griner speaks out for 1st time since being released from Russian prison
description: Brittney Griner thanked her family and friends and credited her faith for surviving her time in custody on Friday in her first comments since being released from Russia.

title: 63-year-old hurt in antisemitic attack in Central Park, police searching for suspect
description: New York City police are searching for the suspect who allegedly made antisemitic statements and attacked a 63-year-old man in Central Park.

title: Report: World's coal use creeps to new high in 2022
description: The International Energy Agency says coal use across the world is set to reach a new record this year amid persistently high demand for the heavily polluting fossil fuel

title: Angelina Jolie leaves role as UN refugee agency envoy
description: Angelina Jolie and the United Nations’ refugee agency are parting ways after more than two decades

title: Nor'easter pummeling Northeast with snow, ice, rain: Latest forecast
description: A Nor'easter is pummeling millions in the Northeast with snow, ice and rain as a major storm continues to sweep its way across the country.

title: QAnon follower who led mob to be sentenced in Jan. 6 Capitol attack
description: QAnon follower to be sentenced in Jan. 6 Capitol attack after leading led mob that chased Capitol Police officer Eugene Goodman.

title: WATCH:  Huge aquarium bursts in Berlin
description: Two people were injured in the incident, which also is presumed to have killed around 1,500 fish.

title: American college student missing from French university found in Spain after 3 weeks
description: Missing American college student Kenny DeLand Jr. has been found in Spain three weeks after he disappeared from his French university.

title: 3 dead following crash between bus and truck in Virginia
description: Virginia State Police say three people have died following a crash that involved a commercial bus carrying 22 people and a tractor trailer on Interstate 64

title: Twitter suspends journalists who wrote about owner Elon Musk
description: Twitter has suspended the accounts of journalists who cover the social media platform and its new owner Elon Musk

title: US puts 3 dozen more Chinese companies on trade blacklist
description: The U.S. Department of Commerce is adding 36 Chinese companies to an export controls blacklist, citing concerns over national security

title: 4 in critical condition after crush at London concert venue
description: Four people have been hospitalized in critical condition after a suspected crush at a London concert venue

title: New poll shows why some adults aren't getting the COVID booster
description: The most common reason vaccinated people aren't getting a COVID booster is that they don't think they need one, a survey found.

title: Huge Berlin aquarium bursts; housed 1,500 tropical fish
description: It caused devastation around Berlin's Sea Life tourist attraction.

title: US recession a growing fear as Fed plans to keep rates high
description: After scaling 40-year highs, inflation in the United States has been slowly easing since summer

title: Report: Executions continued decline but many 'botched'
description: An annual report on capital punishment says public support and use of the death penalty continued a more than two-decade decline in the U.S. in 2022

title: US judge blocks Biden bid to end 'Remain in Mexico' policy
description: The policy dates from the Trump-era.

title: WATCH:  Hungry bear snatches bag of chicken nuggets, fries from porch
description: A Florida family didn't move quickly enough to stop a hungry bear from snatching their Chick-fil-A delivery order.

title: Senate sends Biden bill to keep gov't open through Dec. 23
description: Lawmakers are racing to finish a full-year spending package before the holidays.

title: Louisiana officers charged in Black motorist’s deadly arrest
description: Five Louisiana law enforcement officers have been charged with state crimes for their roles in the deadly 2019 arrest of Ronald Greene

title: Senate passes defense bill rescinding COVID vaccine mandate
description: The bill now goes to President Biden to be signed into law.

title: 4 people impersonate FBI agents in tactical gear during DC armed home robbery
description: Four people impersonate FBI agents in tactical gear during D.C. armed home robbery.
